title: Wikipedia appeals for more editors to combat PR spin
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Wikipedia appeals for more editors to combat PR spin Wikipedia plans to make its site easier to edit Corbis James Dean Technology Correspondent Published at 12:01AM, October 5 2015 
Wikipedia is to boost its dwindling ranks of volunteer editors to ensure that it can neutralise public relations spin, the founder of the online encyclopaedia has said. 
Jimmy Wales said that he was “definitely not going to let Wikipedia become a PR platform” because it would be “so against all of our values”.
